group_1.textLeft: Chisato's favorite food…
She's someone who likes junk food.
One thing that left a particular impression@on me was…

group_1.narration: "Raspberry and Greek yogurt ricotta@Dutch Baby pancake with whole grain@honeycomb butter and ginger chips."

group_1.textLeft: She…loves pancakes.
Still, they're high in calories and very sweet,@so I doubt they'd be suitable for staff meals…

group_1.textRight: …No, pancakes are a completely valid meal.@[chara:300902:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:300902:cheek_0][chara:300902:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json][chara:300902:lipSynch_1]...Erm, here…
Check out this picture on my phone.
See? There's a savory variant with sausages@and the like.

group_1.textLeft: That would make a good staff meal, then.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, and they'd be quick and easy to make.@Plus, you can adapt the recipe,
based on what ingredients are available that day.@It'd be a perfect addition to your repertoire.

group_1.textLeft: But…is it fun?

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* It will be if you add this!

group_1.textLeft: That's…

group_1.textRight: Ketchup!
It'd be fun to make drawings with it,@don't you think?

group_1.textLeft: Chisato would love that…@[chara:406201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:406201:cheek_0][chara:406201:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json][chara:406201:lipSynch_1]Erm, but would ketchup go with the pancakes?

group_1.textRight: You'll have to taste for yourself!@C'mon, let's try making it.

group_1.textLeft: Add the flour and ingredients…erm, sausage…@at the same time…

group_1.textRight: Hm… Oh, Senpai?

group_1.narration: I missed lunch, so I'm making my way@to the restaurant now.

group_1.textRight: [chara:300902:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What…? NOW?!

group_1.textLeft: Is someone coming?

group_1.textRight: *Sigh…* So she was standing right outside@when she sent that…
There you are, right in the kitchen—@Oh, I don't think we've met?

group_1.textLeft: That's Takina Inoue. You might've heard@about her from Iroha.

group_1.textRight: That's right, one of the girls who everyone's@been talking about.
Sorry about that, Takina.@This is Ria Ami.
Takina, was it?@I'm curious to know, do I exist in your world?
I'm a supermodel, so if I exist, you'd surely@know me, correct?

group_1.textLeft: …I'm…not sure…?
Quit using other worlds to puff up your ego.
Look, we're in the middle of a cooking class.@So if you could…

group_1.textRight: Actually, wait… Takina, would you be alright with@her sampling some of what you've made?

group_1.textLeft: …I'd appreciate getting as many opinions@as possible.

group_1.textRight: What are you making?

group_1.textLeft: Pancakes, to be served as a staff meal.

group_1.textRight: Why, I shall certainly have a taste, then!

group_1.textLeft: Oh Senpai, you poor thing…@You must be starving.

group_1.textRight: Oh, stuff it!

group_1.textLeft: It's ready.

group_1.textRight: Oh my, that looks delicious!
Still, it's a little different from the pancakes@I had in mind.
The sausages on the side make it more like@a proper meal.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it's not intended to be a sweet treat,@but a hearty dish.
And now for the finishing touch…

group_1.textRight: Ketchup?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, so we can make a drawing.

group_1.textRight: Does ketchup really go with pancakes…?

group_1.textLeft: There's only one way to find out.

group_1.textRight: C'mon, let's give it a try!

group_1.textLeft: Mmm… This is…!

group_1.textRight: The gentle sweetness of the pancakes and the@tartness of the ketchup… It's a lovely blend!
I'd say it's the exact sort of thing you could@serve in a restaurant.

group_1.textLeft: If I can keep up this momentum and create@a new menu for Cafe LycoReco,
Chisato would be even more impressed.
What's more, it could boost our sales as well.
But I think it would need a bit of extra flair@to make the cut.

group_1.textRight: Maybe we should try giving it a unique touch@for your shop?
You can try spicing things up with different@toppings.

group_1.textLeft: Great idea, I'll try it!
May I borrow some of your ingredients?

group_1.textRight: Sure, grab whatever you can find.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you very much!
